nodes.text: T'rubba was a male Rutian Twi'lek criminal who was a henchman of a crime lord during the Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire. A blue-skinned Twi'lek, T'rubba used two vibroswords in battle, and his lieutenants were known as "Dead Faced Blasters."

T'rubba appears as one of the possible Henchmen Bounties in the Bounty Contract Week, a recurring World Event added to the massively multiplayer online roleplaying video game Star Wars: The Old Republic in Game Update 2.3. T'rubba can be summoned by using Rendezvous Beacon B-12, which appears on the planets Nal Hutta, Ord Mantell, Nar Shaddaa, and Voss. The player has the option to kill him or capture him alive with carbonite, so as a result, this article refrains from assuming which crime lord he worked for, where he was encountered, and his fate.
